thread.title: Is James Bond wrong? Weekend investigate all things 007 ahead of Spectre release
thread.title_full: Is James Bond wrong? Weekend investigate all things 007 ahead of Spectre release

title: Is James Bond wrong? Weekend investigate all things 007 ahead of Spectre release
text:
Tweet 
Our girl Bozzers carries out a thorough investigation to find out what makes the perfect Martini. Is shaken really better than stirred, or was 007 wrong? 
Do you covert James Bond's style, or perhaps you'd love to look like Miss Moneypenny? Our fashion pages show you how to dress to thrill with the help of New Square in West Bromwich. 
We escape to Ian Fleming's secret hideaway in the Seychelles, the place where he found inspiration for some of his best-loved novels. The World is Not Enough but the beaches are pretty good. 
If Bond's not your bag, we've got a chat with Will Young ahead of two gigs at the Symphony Hall. The Pop Idol star turned Olivier Award-winning actor talks about remaining grounded and why he'll never regret appearing on reality TV. We also preview this weekend's X Factor, Doctor Who and catch up with Girls Aloud star Kimberly Walsh. What do you think?
